alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene; Hamblen (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 3:24PM CDT until May 07 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cocke County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Greene County in east Tennessee... East central Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 424 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Russellville, or near Morristown, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greeneville, Mosheim, Caney Branch and Mohawk. This includes Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 15 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
